programme.title: Rabu Belajar Episode 90 Seni Berkomunikasi & Public Speaking
Ramadan The Series. “Bu Juju (Julid & Judes)_ Into the Madness”
Pj. Gub Heru Pastikan Penataan Jaringan Utilitas Sesuai Standar Jakarta sebagai
Musrembang Tahun 2023 tingkat Kota_Kabupaten, di Kantor Wali Kota Jakarta Pusat
Nikmati Perjalanan LRT Rute Velodrome, Korsel Antusias Investasi Pembangunan LRT
Targetkan WTP, Pemprov DKI Jakarta Serahkan LKPD Tahun 2022 kepada BPK
HUT Satpol PP dan Satlinmas Solid, Tanggap, dan Humanis Layani Mayarakat

programme.title: ABC News At Noon
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Millie meets a passionate plantsman, Clarence profiles clay-loving natives, Hannah explains manure benefits, Jane tours an urban bush garden, Guest Presenter Jac plays with flower forms, and we visit a rooftop garden co-op.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin
programme.desc: Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.title: The Pacific
programme.desc: The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea bring you the stories that matter to the Pacific and the most up-to-date information, from journalists with deep regional expertise.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing
programme.desc: Live from Canberra on a Friday afternoon, we bring you the latest on the day in politics, national and global affairs, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders. Plus a panel recap the week's top stories.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Gardening Australia
programme.desc: Millie meets a passionate plantsman, Clarence profiles clay-loving natives, Hannah explains manure benefits, Jane tours an urban bush garden, Guest Presenter Jac plays with flower forms, and we visit a rooftop garden co-op.

programme.title: ABC National News
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: AFLW
programme.desc: 18 teams take part in the 2024 AFLW Season as Australia's leading women's footballers play in 11 home and away rounds plus four weeks of finals to decide the AFLW Premiership.

programme.title: The World
programme.desc: There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's going on in our world. At the earlier time of 9pm AEDT Manny Tsigas brings you the latest international news and interviews with correspondents and guests.

programme.desc: Jay struggles with findings about Jack's death. He looks for clues pointing to foul play and he fights with Geraldine about how best to commemorate his father. Anousha searches for people involved with Josh's case.

programme.desc: The rise of some of Australia's biggest tycoons was incredible. People like Alan Bond, Rene Rivkin, and Christopher Skase had rapid success, achieving great wealth and influence, but their fall was an even greater spectacle.

programme.title: Weekend Breakfast
programme.desc: Ease into your Sunday with an engaging mix of news, updated information, analysis, interviews, politics and weather. Presented by Johanna Nicholson and Fauziah Ibrahim, plus sport with Jared Coote.

programme.title: Insiders
programme.desc: David Speers is in Brisbane to discuss the week including the Queensland Election results and any federal implications with an election within seven months. Plus the latest on the US campaign with 10 days until election day.

programme.title: Australian Story
programme.desc: How Love on the Spectrum and Austin's Michael Theo found his voice and became a global star.

programme.title: Alone Australia

programme.title: Blue Bloods (Season 14)
programme.desc: Jamie works to bust a group of scammers who use artificial intelligence to defraud the elderly.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (Season 14)

programme.title: Seal Team (Season 7)

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior (Season 14)

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven teams up with a new ally to rescue the Gems.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Benson treats the gang a lunch at a Chinese restaurant in honor of celebrating Benson's streak of good luck. Everyone enjoys their time, except for Rigby because of his bad luck.

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: Ben and Gwen spend the day volunteering at Repto Ranch and come face to face with King Koil, but need to quickly overcome their fear of snakes if they are to rescue the released critters and defeat the slithery baddie.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: When Gazpacho arrives home to find his mother missing, he mistakenly assumes that she's been taken hostage by ninjas.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemming's radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Titans return to the alternate reality to save Cyborg but will they be able to defeat the Dragon?

programme.title: Mini Beat Power Rockers
programme.desc: Dolores accidentally shrinks the Power Rockers, making them the size of a flea. They will have to travel across the whole yard to their now enormous instruments and try to get Dolores' attention.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Ranger's storeroom.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes from the Lab, the Boss gives the job of orange-blob-retrieval to Doc Specs and Doc Skinny, who turn out to really suck at orange-blob-retrieval.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike comes to Tom and Jerry for help finding his missing bones and the detectives investigate a community garden.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin dreams of receiving a 1 Dad mug, so Raven magically turns them into a sitcom family.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: A loud racket is affecting Amato's late-night studies. He needs to find it and stop it before he fails his exams.

programme.title: We Bare Bears
programme.desc: The Bears allow bees to live in the cave to make honey. But soon the Bears, entranced by the honey, become the bees' mindless servants.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole tries (and fails) to hide her disappointment when Richard and the kids fail to remember her special day. Richard has to figure out what special day he has actually forgotten, and then make it a day to remember… or else!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally creates an amazing new perfume; but who likes it more? Mrs. Wicket or Scrapper?

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Titans are at Super Hero Summer Camp for the week and they may need to add another teammate to win the big canoe race.

programme.title: Mechamato
programme.desc: The bad robot Cloudiva is causing freak weather events around town. Amato has to stop her, before things get even worse.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Return To Zombie Island
programme.desc: Join Scooby-Doo, Shaggy and the Mystery Inc. gang as they win a vacation of a lifetime and attempt to put their mystery solving days behind them. They soon find out paradise comes with a price when they encounter an army of zombies!

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After Clarence accidentally knocks Belson's new videogame down a storm drain, Belson enters the large underground sewer tunnel to retrieve it. When Belson doesn't return, Clarence must decide whether or not to go in after him...

programme.title: Ben 10

programme.title: Chowder

programme.desc: The three teams of Ninja are close to possessing all three Dragon Cores, but enemies and unexpected allies complicate the search.

programme.title: Lego Dreamzzz

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry pretends to be a vampire to scare Tom. Now it's up to Tom - with the help of his friend Newt - to defeat the vampire mouse!

programme.title: Ben 10: Omniverse
programme.desc: The Incursean Armada, with the help of Dr. Psychobos, have invaded the Earth. (Reintroducing old Ben alien, BenMummy)

programme.title: Ben 10: Omniverse
programme.desc: Albedo seeks a device that will finally change him back into his Galvan form, meanwhile Ben is locked in Plumber HQ prison.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings play with poseable figurines of wild Canadian animals.

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam’s life. Ma’s fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: iGirl
programme.desc: Evan, Johnny, and Irwin are best friends. All three of them get dumped by their girlfriends one day and decide to find three robotic substitutes, the iGirls, as their new girlfriends. However, as time goes by, Evan finds himself falling in love with his iGirl…

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi’s actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Sound of Colors
programme.desc: Lonesome marriage consultant Ming meets a blind but charming young lady, Yeuk, at a subway station. When Ming suddenly turns blind too, Yeuk helps him navigate through his world of darkness, and they begin to fall in love. This feature is based on the illustrated book from famous Taiwan illustrator Jimmy Liao.

programme.title: Echoes of the Thunder
programme.desc: Two half-brothers, Nam and Fire, are top racing drivers. In a racing challenge with Japanese driver Kenji, Nam causes a young racing driver to be seriously injured and is depressed. Fire stands up for Nam and decides to compete with Kenji in an illegal street car race. Who will win the race? Can Nam finally bounce back?

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Eva’s mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mother’s wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Eva’s heart?

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of “Infernal Affairs” are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Adventure of the King
programme.desc: The Ming Emperor Zhengde flees the palace to see the world after his mother orders him to marry an ugly princess. He disguises as a commoner and escapes with his advisors, but a gambling mishap causes them to part ways and Zhengde lost all his money. Phoenix, the owner of Lung Fung Inn, takes him in out of pity, and thus begins his new adventure...

programme.title: Ashes of Time Redux
programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident…

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the club’s top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tung’s mad fate?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son’s talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Over My Dead Body
programme.desc: This dark comedy begins with an unidentified corpse appearing at the doorstep of a residential flat. Fearing that the corpse will turn their flats into "haunted flats", which will cause a drastic drop in the property value, the four families living on the same floor attempt to move the corpse away, embroiling themselves in chaos.

programme.desc: After his beloved woman married his brother, Ou Yang Feng moves to the desert to run an inn and becomes a killer agent. He makes acquaintance of different people with their different stories ... The movie is the winner of the 1st Hong Kong Film Critics Society Awards for Best Film, Best Director, Best Screenplay and Best Actor (Leslie Cheung).

programme.title: The Italian Recipe
programme.desc: Famous pop idol Peng travels to Rome for a reality show and encounters an ordinary girl, Mang, who dreams of becoming a great chef after migrating to Italy. Peng and Mang have nothing in common but spend a magical night in Rome together. Their lives begin to change as the two start to fall in love.

programme.title: Turns We Take
programme.desc: A spicy hot pot restaurant in Northeast China serves different types of customers every day. Amongst them are a sweet young couple, two wayward young men and a taxi driver. Despite being complete strangers to each other, their lives are intertwined by a traffic accident…

programme.title: Night and Fog
programme.desc: Following “The Way We Are”, this is based on a true story happening in Tin Shui Wai. It revolves around an older, unemployed Hong Kong man, his young Mainland wife and their two daughters. Their lives, unfortunately, are anything but easy, and the shocking conclusion raises issues about the plight of the socially deprived lower class.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Wei Hung Jen is a struggling actor who gets fired but finds a job behind the scene. Hui Hsin, the associate producer, must write a script for a love story so as to get a reference letter to study scriptwriting overseas. As Jen falls for Hui, he invites her out on a date as a research for her script and they start acting out of love.

programme.title: Echoes of the Rainbow
programme.desc: Set in Hong Kong in the 1960s, the story revolves around the family of a hardworking shoemaker Mr Law, with his happy-go-lucky wife and two sons – a talented elder son and an eight-year-old eccentric younger son. While their lives are not always smooth-sailing, the family sticks together and support one another through thick and thin.

programme.title: Initial D
programme.desc: The movie is adapted from a famous Japanese manga. 18-year-old Takumi delivers tofu in his father's near-obsolete car every day and becomes a good racer with perfect drifting skill. Encouraged by his father, he joins a mountain race and unexpectedly wins it, making him famous overnight and leading him from one exciting race to another.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the club’s top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: We are Family
programme.desc: Struggling as an extra, Chi Kwong joins a rent-a-family company run by Carlos and aspiring actress Catherine, and rent themselves out as make-believe relatives. As they surrogate different families, they unravel the complexities of family relationships, forging deeper connections along the way.

programme.title: Midnight Diner
programme.desc: A small restaurant in Shanghai is open only from midnight to early morning. The chef has no menu but will create something unique for each customer. Through the years, people come to the Midnight Diner to share their stories, taste the chef’s delicious food and leave feeling comforted and fulfilled.

programme.title: Mad Fate
programme.desc: A Master fortune teller predicts that Tung, a born psychopath, will be imprisoned for murder and tries to change his fate. A veteran detective believes Tung is a psychopathic serial killer after witnessing him kill a cat, and pursues him relentlessly. Can the Master change Tung’s mad fate?

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xing’s son attempts drug trafficking to save his father’s studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: Distinction
programme.desc: A music teacher in a special needs school, an underachiever from an elite school, and a rebellious teenager with a handicapped brother take part in a campus musical for various reasons. Little did they know that this turns out to be a journey of self-discovery.

programme.title: Everything is Unknown
programme.desc: Pan Yi Ming receives his father's will stating that he must attend his funeral at home to claim the huge inheritance. When he returns home, he encounters his ex-girlfriend, her husband Hua Qi and his daughter whom he has never met. When Pan discovers that his daughter is being abused by Hua, he vows to save her but eventually fall into their trap…

programme.title: Cliff Walkers
programme.desc: The first spy thriller movie by famous Director Zhang Yi Mou, this film follows four Communist Party special agents who embark on a secret operation in the Japanese puppet state of Manchukuo in 1932. Sold out by a traitor, the agents, who split up into two teams, find themselves surrounded by threats on all sides. Can they complete their mission?

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his son’s talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: Bodyguards and Assassins
programme.desc: On 15 October 1906, Chinese revolutionary leader Sun Yat Sen returned to Hong Kong to stage another overthrow of the Qing dynasty. Businessman Lee and Chinese Daily’s Chief Chan arrange for five bodyguards to protect Mr Sun - these are all extraordinary fighters who are ready and up for fierce battles against the Qing assassination army.

programme.title: American Dreams in China
programme.desc: During the economic reform period in the 80’s, three undergraduates are brought together by a common ambition – to live the American dream.

programme.title: The Rookies
programme.desc: An extreme sports lover accidentally gets involved in an illegal trading activity by international crime syndicates. Led by international special agent Bruce, he forms an amateur unit with a police officer, an inventor and a doctor to fight the crime syndicates together, leading to a series of thrilling and hilarious adventures.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her team’s performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chan’s help.

programme.title: The Moon Thieves
programme.desc: A crooked watch dealer assembles a daring crew - a thief, an explosive expert, a lock breaker and a watch connoisseur - to steal three luxury watches in Tokyo. Their mission takes an unexpected turn when they discover the legendary 'Moonwatch.' Pursued by the yakuza, the team must unite to navigate the chaos and pull off their high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of “Young and Dangerous”, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on CGTN. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. Hundreds of state heads, diplomats, business leaders and culture icons have appeared on DIALOGUE . It reaches viewers across China and over 80 million subscribers around the world.

programme.title: The Hub With Wang Guan
programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on what’s relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: Rediscovering China
programme.desc: Rediscovering China is a half-hour documentary program on CGTN. Each edition offers unique insight into various aspects of life in China today. With unrivalled access to the country's people and places, the program aims to show the global audience an inclusive and vigorous China.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on CGTN. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin’s very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of CGTN’s English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The biz program offers a truly global perspective, loaded with local insights.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by CGTN’s studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country’s business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. Every Monday to Friday, it provides nutrition to form your own thoughts and ideas through live debate and interviews. Live debates linking movers and shakers take place in the signature segment “Global Debate”. It features a diversity of perspectives and insights on the most important global news and stories of our time. Its face-to-face "Exclusive Interview" segment welcomes both existing big names and future players from all walks of life. World Insight with Tian Wei, always embraces changes, enriching and inspiring, hearts and minds.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation. Our exclusive features, "Tackling China", "CBA Stories", and "Beyond the Baseline", take you behind the scenes and closer to the top athletes in China, by providing a unique perspective on the top sports stories.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: Global Watch
programme.desc: GLOBAL WATCH is a 60 minute-long news program. The show stresses Chinese elements, emphasizing China’s perspective, policies and stories. The program, relying on global reporting resources, presents in-depth analysis and coverage of major global issues, from a Chinese perspective on international affairs. The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. Each 30-minute TV edition is hosted by a long-term expatriate in China who has a unique understanding of the country’s culture. He or she will introduce viewers to people who are dedicating their lives to its protection, inheritance, innovation, development and promotion.

programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, the Agenda quite simply sets the agenda. You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda with Stephen Cole: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Full Frame
programme.desc: Full Frame is a one hour program from CGTN America. Produced in Los Angeles, Full Frame is a unique CGTN production. It combines high-end production with editorial values that brand the show’s demand to be different. The result is a program that appeals to a global audience on CGTN, yet satisfies the need for niche programming on many channels in North America, ensuring maximum exposure, added value and impact.

programme.title: Supermarket Sweep US S2
programme.desc: Now in its second season, join the fun as three teams battle it out in the studio supermarket, testing their grocery knowledge and speed to win big cash prizes in every episode.

programme.title: Ken Arok-Ken Dedes
programme.desc: Ken Arok, yang dibesarkan oleh seorang perampok, berhasil diterima menjadi prajurit di Tumapel. Disana ia berjumpa dengan Ken Dedes, istri Tunggul Ametung. Niat untuk menyingkirkan Tunggul Ametung pun muncul dibenaknya, untuk mendapatkan Ken Dedes.

programme.title: Pokun Roxy
programme.desc: Kisah tentang arwah gentayangan, pocong dan kuntilanak yang kerap meneror warga kampung. Fenomena ini disiasati Acong. Acong pun meminta Jupe dan Bedul berpura-pura menjadi pocong dan kuntilanak. Adegan ini direkam Acong pakai handphone, yang kemudian ia pamerkan kepada warga. Masyarakat geger dengan aksi Acong.

programme.title: Bunga Cinta Kasih
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Trisna, anak dari kampung dan Gita, anak keluarga terpandang yang terpilih menjadi ketua dan wakil ketua di kelasnya. Mulai dari sinilah tumbuh benih2 cinta antara keduanya, tetapi hubungan ini mendapat tentangan dari orang tua Astri.

programme.title: Gentayangan
programme.desc: Abimanyu Karindra tak punya pilihan selain membawa istrinya, Sofia dan kedua anak mereka serta adiknya Sheila untuk menetap di hotel peninggalan orangtua di lembah gunung ratusan kilometer dari Jakarta, setelah dinyatakan bangkrut oleh pengadilan. Hotel Kaki Langit yang awalnya dianggap sebagai tempat tinggal yang nyaman dan tenang, berubah menjadi teror menakutkan hanya beberapa saat setelah keluarga Karindra mulai menempatinya.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 3
programme.desc: Samantha yang memiliki misi pribadi untuk mencabut wangsit yang ia miliki berupa kekuatan untuk memanggil kuntilanak bertemu dengan rombongan Darwin, Asti, Herman dan Petra yang mencari 2 orang temannya yang hilang di desa Ujung Sedo. Halangan dan rintangan harus dihadapi oleh Samantha demi menuntaskan misinya.

programme.title: Dunia Mereka
programme.desc: Film ini menceritakan tentang sebuah band yang terdiri dari beberapa orang yang mempertemukan mereka karena selera musik yang sama. Namun dalam perjalanan mereka, berbagai masalah pun berdatangan.

programme.title: Ratu Kostmopolitan
programme.desc: Tiga cewek cantik dan bokek mau tidak mau harus jumpalitan, putar otak, dan baca mantra buat mengusir preman yang mau menggusur rumah kost mereka. Sambil rebutan cowok, pula!

programme.title: Suami-Suami Takut Istri
programme.desc: Demi mengabulkan permintaan para istri yang meminta berbulan madu ke Bali, para suami pun mengajak para istri ke Bali. Walaupun sebenarnya ada maksud lain dibalik kebaikan para suami. Mereka berencana untuk menghadiri pertunjukan super sexy dari Trio Ganas. Namun akhirnya para istri mengetahui adanya rencana lain dari para suami.

programme.title: Hattrick
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang turnamen futsal internasional. Kebetulan tahun ini diadakan di Indonesia, maka dicarilah pemain-pemain terbaik dari seulurh Indonesia untuk dididik dan diikutkan dalam turnamen ini.

programme.title: Hijab
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang keempat sahabat Anin, Bia,Tata dan Sari. Mereka mempunyai gaya berpenampilan berbeda-beda kecuali Anin yang tidak memakai Hijab. Kegalauan mereka semakin meningkat karena mereka berhijab dan mendapatkan uang dari "Ikut Suami". Namun hal itu dibantah dengan mereka membangun bisnis Hijab dan berhasil. Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

programme.title: Ayat-Ayat Adinda
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang Adinda yang tinggal bersama keluarga yang memiliki pandangan hidup sediri dan lari dari ajaran agama sesunguhnya. Suatu ketika Adinda membrontak dengan ingin mengikuti lomba MTQ disekolahannya. Halangan dari sang Ayah pun datang untuk berhenti mengikuti lomba itu. Lingkungan disekitarpun menjadi curiga terhadap keluarga tersebut, dan hal itu mungkin bisa menjadi ancaman hidup keluarga Adinda.

programme.title: Kuntilanak
programme.desc: Di kamar kost baru Samantha, terdapat mitos kuntilanak & dia mulai merasakan keanehan yang berujung pada terungkapnya jati diri Sam yang sebenarnya.

programme.title: Arie Hanggara
programme.desc: Kisah nyata setelah warga Jakarta dihebohkan kasus meninggalnya seorang bocah 8 tahun bernama Arie Hanggara akibat penyiksaan orang tuanya.

programme.title: Cewek Gokil
programme.desc: Keke bukan sembarang anak perempuan, kepalanya penuh dengan cita-cita dan keinginan. Impian Keke yang semakin dekat, tapi suatu kejadian memaksa Keke untuk merelakan mimpi yang sudah diraihnya itu

programme.title: Kesurupan Jumat Kliwon
programme.desc: Menceritakan keempat pemuda yang memutuskan untuk bunuh diri karena berbagai masalah. Sebelum bunuh diri, mereka berlibur di rumah tua dekat pantai, yang dimana rumah itu terkenal angker. Terror kepada mereka pun terus berlanjut dihari pertama yaitu malam jumat kliwon.

programme.title: Ponirah Terpidana
programme.desc: Sedari kecil, Ponirah dianggap membawa kesialan bagi orang sekitarnya. Ibunya meninggal ketika melahirkannya. Lalu sang kakak meninggal saat memboncenginya naik sepeda. Lalu ia dibawa kabur oleh pelayannya yang setia, diselamatkan dari amukan ayahnya yang kalap ingin membunuhnya. Ketika dewasa, ia tergoda oleh rayuan seorang calo pencari wanita muda untuk dijadikan wanita penghibur di Jakarta. Ponirah pun bertekad menjadi wanita penghibur termahal.

programme.title: Bidadari Pulau Hantu
programme.desc: Evan dan Gesti melakukan pemotretan pre-wedding di pulau yang dikenal sebagai pulau hantu. Pulau ini terkenal dengan sosok hantu perempuan yang membawa celurit dan menggunakan gaun pengantin. Pasangan ini mengajak Remon seorang fotografer, Remi, pria penata rias kemayu, Vidi, sepupu Gesti, dan Tilda. Di hari pertama pemotretan, hantu perempuan bergaun pengantin sudah menteror rombongan Evan dan Gesti

programme.title: Setannya Kok Masih Ada
programme.desc: Dedi dan Beno yang bekerja di kamar mayat berkenalan dengan Maya. Maya yang baru saja kehilangan kakeknya mendapatkan warisan rumah berikut perkebunannya. Namun karena menemukan banyak keanehan di rumah itu, Maya menyewa Dedi dan Beno untuk menjaga rumah warisan tersebut.

programme.title: Cintaku Di Kampus Biru
programme.desc: Anton, mahasiswa cerdas, aktivis, ganteng, dan seolah penakluk wanita. Ia menghadapi masalah lain: seorang dosen yang dianggap menghambat mahasiswa, Yusnita. Anton berusaha menaklukkan Yusnita untuk mengatasi masalahnya

programme.title: Cinta Kembar
programme.desc: Rhoma Irama sukses besar sebagai musikus dangdut. Kedua adiknya, Deddy dan Herry penuh semangat berlatih karena ingin mengikuti jejak sang kakak. Sebagai remaja, keduanya tak lepas dengan masalah asmara. Kakak-beradik ini mempunyai pacar gadis kembar, Ela dan Eli. Pada saat orang tua Ela dan Eli ingin menjodohkan salah satu anak kembarnya dengan pria lain, mereka menolak, karena cinta kedua pasangan itu sudah begitu mendalam. Cobaan Deddy bukan saja datang dari orang tua Eli, tetapi datang pula dari pemuda lain terhadap Eli.

programme.title: Selamanya
programme.desc: Aristha berjumpa dengan kekasih lamanya, Bara, di kantor polisi. Bara, yang merasa bersalah karena menjerumuskan Aristha ke dunia narkoba, berusaha keras menarik Aristha dari dunia itu

programme.title: Video Maut
programme.desc: Menceritakan tentang Doni yang memiliki keinginan untuk membuat video mesum dengan kekasihnya Maya di sebuah villa. Maya merupakan gadis lugu yang dikerjai oleh Doni. Di villa itu maya tidak sendiri namun mengajak temanya dan membuat rencana Doni berantakan, akhirnya ia membuat rencana agar teman-teman maya pergi dan melancarkan aksinya. Saat Doni merayu Maya dan memulai membuat video munculah sosok menyeramkan. Doni dan maya akhirnya gila. Video itu tersebar di dunia maya, dan barang siapa yang menontonya akan mati dibunuh oleh sosok menyeramkan di video itu.

programme.title: Cowok Bikin Pusing
programme.desc: 3 sahabat sejati yang selalu mendukung untuk semua hal, termasuk kisah sakit hati dengan makhluk yang namanya Cowok.

programme.title: Nazar
programme.desc: Cindy, cewek trendi yang benar-benar memenangkan mobil mewah dari undian tutup botol, mati-matian berusaha membatalkan nazar asal-asalannya.

programme.title: Maju Kena Mundur Kena Returns
programme.desc: Berkisah Trio WOW: Wira, Ozie dan Wulu yang tertantang menyelinap masuk ke asrama cewek-cewek cantik yang berdekatan dengan mini market tempat kerja mereka. Supaya bisa masuk Wira pura-pura impoten, Ojie pura-pura buta, sedangkan Wulu menyelinap ke asrama seperti maling.

programme.title: Jones: Jomblo Ngenes
programme.desc: Noval jatuh cinta saat bertemu Astika. Tapi di antara suka dan bahagia, ada pula rasa sakit. Noval berkali-kali terjerumus di situasi di mana Astika memperdayainya. Astika meminta Noval berbuat dan berkata aneh-aneh di berbagai situasi menggelikan. Noval bisa saja menjauh, tapi pesona Atika membuatnya tak bisa meninggalkannya.

programme.title: Melodi Cinta Rhoma Irama
programme.desc: Rhoma jatuh cinta dengan Ricca dan sempat merencanakan pernikahan. Namun jalinan cinta mereka diganggu oleh Herman yang juga mencintai Ricca dan ingin menguasai harta ayah Ricca

programme.title: Baby Blues
programme.desc: Sepasang suami-istri, Andika dan Dinda tidak menyangka bahwa merawat bayi tidak semudah yang dibayangkan. Hal ini membuat Dinda mengalami sindrom baby blues yang kemudian memicu perdebatan dan pertengkaran.

programme.title: Kuntilanak 2
programme.desc: Setelah peristiwa dalam film sebelumnya, Sam (Julie Estelle) sudah putus dengan Agung dan saat ini berada dalam dilema dalam memperjuangkan jati dirinya dari sisi gelapnya yang semakin kuat kendati adanya wangsit Kuntilanak.

programme.title: Toilet 105
programme.desc: Toilet yang dimiliki oleh SMU Bina Persada selalu wangi dan bersih, hingga jadi favorit tak hanya siswa-siwa tapi juga 'penghuni' lainnya, makhluk halus. Okta, Ical, dan Rio adalah siswa yang selalu mendapat teror dari 'penghuni' toilet itu.

programme.title: Kesurupan Jumat Kliwon
programme.desc: Menceritakan keempat pemuda yang memutuskan untuk bunuh diri karena berbagai masalah. Sebelum bunuh diri, mereka berlibur di rumah tua dekat pantai, yang dimana rumah itu terkenal angker. Terror kepada mereka pun terus berlanjut dihari pertama yaitu malam jumat kliwon.

programme.title: Dia Yang Tercinta
programme.desc: Harliman bekerja pada Rachman yang dahulu menikahi kekasihnya, Lestari. Dalam sebuh kecelakaan mobil, Rachmat meninggal dan Harliman berhasil merebut Lestari. Namun entah kenapa setelah menikah kemudian Harliman berubah sikap dan menyakiti Lestari.

Dengan penghasilan mereka yang melebihi para suaminya, keharmonisan rumah tangga merekapun mulai diuji.

programme.title: Laundry Show
programme.desc: Kisah bermula tentang seoranng pemuda, Kokoh, yang memilih keluar dari kantornya untuk mendirikan sebuah usaha binatu. Di awal perjalanan usahanya, dia harus berhadapan dengan pegawai yang punya berbagai kepribadian jenaka nan konyol. Akan tetapi, tantangan terbesarnya lewat persaingan dari Agustina yang juga mendirikan usaha binatu.

programme.title: Bila Hati Perempuan Menjerit
programme.desc: Bercerita tentang Indahsari yang selalu menjadi ratu batik tiga tahun berturut-turut tidak tahu bahwa masalah menghampirinya saat ia berkenalan dengan Boy. Saking tergila-gilanya akan Indah, Boy yang selalu berusaha mendekati Indah yang sudah akan menikah, nekat memperkosa Indah. Saat dinyatakan tidak bersalah, Indah melakukan main hakim sendiri, karena ternyata Boy juga memperkosa adiknya, Astri.

programme.title: Rumah Hantu Pasar Malam
programme.desc: Misteri pembunuhan terjadi di pasar malam desa Sumber Sari. Namun daya tarik pasar malam tersebut seakan tidak pernah berhenti menarik pengunjungnya, termasuk kelima sahabat yang sedang mengunjungi desa tersebut. Teror pun kemudian kembali terjadi. Satu persatu korban berjatuhan dan mengancam nyawa kelima sahabat tersebut.

programme.title: Power Of Soul
programme.desc: Pembawa acara hadir dalam bincang-bincang hangat bersama para narasumber terkemuka, mengulas topik-topik seputar dunia kesehatan dan berbagi informasi tentang cara-cara alternatif untuk merawat dan menyembuhkan berbagai jenis penyakit.

programme.title: Shop Vitgreenz
programme.desc: Pembawa acara menjelaskan berbagai manfaat dari produk-produk pengobatan herbal yang dapat digunakan untuk melangsingkan tubuh, serta memberikan sederet penawaran menarik.

programme.title: Berkah Shop

programme.title: Soap: Il Paradiso delle Signore 8 Daily
The Aviator
programme.desc: A biopic depicting the early years of legendary Director and aviator Howard Hughes' career from the late 1920s to the mid 1940s

programme.title: The Usual Suspects
programme.desc: After five criminals are released from a random police lineup, they plan a major heist that goes horribly awry. The police search for a mysterious crime lord, "Keyser Soze," who seems to be tied to the heist.

programme.title: Battle In Seattle
programme.desc: Seattle broke into a full-scale state of emergency as thousands of protestors gathered in resistance to the World Trade Organization. The lives of the city’s mayor, a SWAT cop on the streets and his pregnant wife, and four demonstrators intersect in the e

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanity’s escape.

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: A convicted thief poses as a cop in order to retrieve a stolen diamond.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the world’s smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Inside Man: Most Wanted
programme.desc: A hostage negotiator from the NYPD teams up with an FBI agent to save innocent lives when a cunning bank robber takes over the Federal Reserve Bank.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: The flightless birds and scheming green pigs take their beef to the next level.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanity’s escape.

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Ethan and Lena meet and fall in love, and together, they uncover dark secrets about their respective families, their history, and their town in this supernatural romance thriller.

programme.title: Legion
programme.desc: Armed and united by the Archangel Michael, a group of strangers become unwitting soldiers on the frontlines of the Apocalypse. Their mission: protect a waitress and her sacred unborn child from the relentless, bloody siege of the demonic legion.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Horsemen
programme.desc: A detective is investigates a series of murders that are based on the biblical prophecies concerning the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse—War, Famine, Pestilence, and Death—and discovers a terrifying link between himself and the suspects.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

programme.title: Scream 4
programme.desc: Neve Campbell, Courtney Cox, and David Arquette resurrect their famous roles in this spine-chilling sequel. Ghostface returns to Woodsboro – but it’s a new decade, with new rules.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: A blind girl receives a cornea transplant so that she is able to see again. However, she gets more than she bargains for when she realizes she can see disturbing ghosts.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Terror Birds
programme.desc: Maddy and her college friends trek into the wilderness to find her father, but instead, they encounter killer terror birds once thought to be extinct.

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: A bank clerk leading a seemingly uneventful life in a quiet little town finds his life suddenly changed after a local train accident threatens to reveal his biggest secret.

programme.title: Kaw
programme.desc: The raven has a body that is twenty inches long with a three foot wing span and razor sharp beak and talons. When these birds begin to attack humans in a small town, there is no where to hide.

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson has been framed for a fire on The Pearl. A wanted man on the run, Will must find those responsible, clear his name and somehow rescue his family who is trapped inside the building...above the fire line.

programme.title: Seattle Superstorm
programme.desc: When a massive storm threatens the Pacific Northwest, a family must find each other and work together to put a stop to the storm before it spreads beyond their control and annihilates the planet!

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus has made a habit of running from what scares him. Tallahassee doesn't have fears. In a world overrun by zombies, these two are perfectly evolved survivors. But now, they're about to stare down the most terrifying prospect of all: each other.

programme.title: Curse Of Chucky
programme.desc: He's back! From the filmmakers that brought you Chucky comes the terrifying return of the pint-sized doll possessed by the spirit of a notorious serial killer.

programme.title: Cult Of Chucky
programme.desc: Confined to an asylum for the criminally insane for the past four years, Nica (Fiona Dourif) is wrongly convinced that she, not Chucky, murdered her entire family.

programme.title: Carrie
programme.desc: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

programme.title: Horsemen
programme.desc: A detective is investigates a series of murders that are based on the biblical prophecies concerning the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse—War, Famine, Pestilence, and Death—and discovers a terrifying link between himself and the suspects.

programme.title: The Crow
programme.desc: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.
A man writing a book about the paranormal travels to New York and stays in a hotel room that has been said to be responsible for the death of all the guests that come to stay.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: Dean Corso is a rare book dealer with a taste for the finer things in life. When he is tasked with hunting down a dangerous sorcery book, he finds himself caught up in the chilling world of black magic, where he soon realizes he is out of his depth.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: An unlikely group of former '80s video game champions step up to save the world from an alien invasion in this visually spectacular action-adventure.

programme.title: After Earth
programme.desc: A crash landing leaves teenager Kitai Raige (Jaden Smith) and his legendary father Cypher (Will Smith) stranded on Earth, 1,000 years after cataclysmic events forced humanity’s escape.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Lake Placid
programme.desc: A female paleontologist from New York City heads to Maine where local fish and game officials have discovered a gigantic and deadly 30-foot crocodile that appears to be living in one of the local .akes.

programme.title: Pet Sematary
programme.desc: Pet Sematary follows Dr. Louis Creed, who, after relocating with his wife Rachel and their two young children from Boston to rural Maine, discovers a mysterious burial ground hidden deep in the woods near the family's new home.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus has made a habit of running from what scares him. Tallahassee doesn't have fears. In a world overrun by zombies, these two are perfectly evolved survivors. But now, they're about to stare down the most terrifying prospect of all: each other.

programme.title: Courants D'Est
programme.desc: Weiterswiller, in the Vosges, is home to the Ruymon Ji Monastery. Veritable institution of Zen Buddhism, the temple was founded over twenty years ago by Master Olivier Reigen Wang-Genh. Since then, nuns, monks and lay people continue to live there in accordance with the rules of Soto Zen Buddhism.

programme.title: Zvicra
programme.desc: ''Zvicra'' means ''Swiss'' in Albanian. Switzerland counts some 300,000 residents of Albanian origin. Since the 1990s, they have formed one of the country's largest foreign communities: for some integration is easy, for others it's more difficult. But for each, Albania remains forever engraved on their heart. Interwoven portraits.

programme.title: Télématin

programme.title: L'Imagier Animé De Koumi

programme.title: Taffy
programme.desc: Wealthy Mrs. Muchmore lives in a manor with her beloved dog Bentley. One day, Scraggs the raccoon turns up disguised as a cat. Immediately adopted by the old lady, he becomes Taffy and laps up her attention. But Bentley is not fooled and decides to chase him off his territory.

programme.title: Kididoc
programme.desc: Kidi, a kind-hearted artificial intelligence, guides Pomme and Fix on their journey through Kidi-World. From dinosaurs to the Château de Versailles, the human body to the history of aviation: Kidi-World is not only an adventure-filled wonderland but also, and above all, a means of finding the answer to every question.

programme.title: Kididoc

programme.title: Nubu Et Yara
programme.desc: Young Nubu is a little boy who's curious about everything but makes one blunder after another as he learns about life. Fortunately his wiser more responsible older sister, Yara, always has the time to explain things, offering the perfect opportunity for Nubu to dive into his own comic book world.

programme.title: 1001 Moyen-Âges
programme.desc: Braillard, Colombe and Lablatte have discovered a way to travel through time and ancient civilisations. They journey back in time to the Middle Ages, in search of answers. How did people live in those days? How did they heal themselves? How did they see that justice was done?

programme.title: Dessine-Moi Les Étoiles
programme.desc: Science explained by cartoon artist Fiami, through questions asked by two children. Further explanations from a philosopher and an astronomer help popularize science and envision it as a great human adventure.

programme.title: Quasimodo
programme.desc: Paris, 1483. 16-year-old Quasimodo is a hunchbacked orphan. One day, the gypsy Esmeralda, with whom he is in love, finds herself in trouble. He sacrifices himself to save her and ends up in prison. And so begins a long series of adventures...

programme.title: Les P'Tits Diables
programme.desc: Between 6-year old Tom and his 8-year old sister Nina, it is war. They constantly fight like cat and dog. But for their parents, their moments of truce are even more worrying!

programme.title: 7 Jours
programme.desc: Weekly current affairs program with French subtitles that review the major events of the week.

programme.title: Falò

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo

''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Télévisions).

programme.title: Destination Francophonie
programme.desc: A journey throughout the French-speaking world to explore every corner of the globe! In each country we meet francophones who present, in French, their culture, way of life and commitments. The programme also shines a spotlight on local projects that keep the French language alive, dynamic and constantly evolving.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Helvetica

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Arriving in France in 2001 from Antananarivo, Harisoa settled in Plouguiel, Côtes-d'Armor. She then set about learning the language and dances of Brittany, that she went on to teach. Today, she cares for women suffering from Alzheimer's and helps her native country through the association Solidarité Trégor Madagascar.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match

programme.title: Latitudes Du Changement
programme.desc: A group of ordinary people join the sailing vessel ''Atlas'' for a 12,000 km journey to Greenland. A voyage during which they will be collecting scientific data, exploring new horizons, braving storms: a human adventure driven by participative science and a need to push themselves to their limit and beyond.

programme.title: Tendance Xxi

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: The Cluny Museum recounts mediaeval art. Gastronomy on a plate with chef Victor Mercier: you don't need to travel far to discover new horizons! programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4
programme.desc: The Jokers give each other humiliating tasks to complete on the mall escalator, ask absurd survey questions at the zoo and are forced to whisper sweet nothings to grocery store patrons. Plus, tonight's losers are the surprise opening act for ImagineDragons and must perform for 14,000 disappointed music fans.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4
programme.desc: Murr, Joe, Sal and Q get creative with their French fries at the mall food court, and compete to see whose ridiculous invention will win over a focus group. Then, the guys head to the Jersey Shore to serve up some embarrassment at a beachside burgerjoint.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2
programme.desc: Thony is confronted by Garrett about Maya's death. Fiona helps Luca celebrate his birthday. Thony takes things into her own hands to ensure Fiona and Luca’s safety.

programme.title: Arrow S2
programme.desc: When Laurel asks the Arrow to investigate Sebastian Blood, Oliver is unsure whether to believe her accusations. But when they get too close to the truth, Blood strikes back.

programme.title: The Mentalist S5
programme.desc: Jane and the CBI team investigate the murder of elderly heiress Elise Vogelson (guest star MARIETTE HARTLEY), whose remains are found in the living room of her spooky mansion.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16
programme.desc: Let freedom ring, as World's Dumbest presents "Only in America." Featuring 20 of the most patriotic patriots in the land - from a cop's strange take on the national anthem, to a dangerous mishap with a bald eagle, and the most insane thank you to thetroops ever put on film. Plus awesome commentary from our cast of America's best comics, including Brendon Walsh, Kevin McCaffrey and Jaime Andrews.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S5
programme.desc: Jesse and Papa Bear team up to go after a barbed-wire-protected safe. It's a big day for Brandon and Lori - they score an awesome sand rail, and a vintage surfboard which turns out to be highly collectible.

programme.title: Container Wars S1
programme.desc: Maniac Matt is out to prove a point in the port of Oakland. He gambles early on a container full of liquor, then drives up prices forcing everyone else to pony up.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4
programme.desc: The guys compete to stay undetected in a high flying challenge, force each other to do absurd tasks at a music store, and try to get a compliment on some not-so stylish outfits.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S4
programme.desc: The guys blindly follow each other's humiliating directions at a water park, compete to sell their ridiculous book ideas, and try to convince unknowing strangers to save their seats in Time Square.

programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: Oscar nominee Josh Brolin plays Jonah Hex, a scarred drifter and bounty hunter who can track down anyone...and anything. Having survived death, Jonah's violent history is steeped in myth and legend - leaving him with one foot in the natural world and one on the "other side." His only human connection is with Lilah (Transformers' Megan Fox), whose life in a brothel has left her with scars of her own. But Jonah's past is about to catch up with him when the U.S. military makes him an offer he can't refuse: in exchange for his freedom, he must track down and stop the dangerous terrorist Quentin Turnbull (Oscar nominee John Malkovich). But Turnbull, who is gathering an army and preparing to unleash Hell, is also Jonah's oldest enemy and will stop at nothing until Jonah is dead. Based on the legendary graphic novel, this epic adventure thriller gives a new face to the comic book genre by combining the Western genre with supernatural elements.

programme.title: Container Wars S1
programme.desc: Things get testy when maniac Matt goes toe-to-tow with the Israelis on a container full of high end hunting equipment, and the bidding boils over when Jason tries to one-up them on a promising container from Japan.

programme.title: Container Wars S1
programme.desc: Manic Matt laughs hard when the others spend big money on what looks like junk, but when Matt bets his entire wallet on a container he thinks can make him rich, will he wind up the butt of the joke?

programme.title: This Is Where I Leave You
programme.desc: When their father passes away, four grown siblings (Jason Bateman, Tina Fey, Adam Driver, Corey Stoll), bruised and banged up by their respective adult lives, are forced to return to their childhood home and live under the same roof together for a week, along with their over-sharing mother (Jane Fonda) and an assortment of spouses, exes and might-have-beens. Confronting their history and the frayed states of their relationships among the people who know and love them best, they ultimately reconnect in hysterical and emotionally affecting ways amid the chaos, humor, heartache and redemption that only families can provide-- driving us insane even as they remind us of our truest, and often best, selves. Comedy director Shawn Levy (Date Night)helms the hilarious script by Jonathan Tropper based on his own best-selling novel.

programme.title: Interview With The Vampire

programme.title: Phobia
programme.desc: Mehak is a talented young artist who, after surviving a traumatic attack, develops severe agoraphobia. She is terrified of the outside world. Her friend Shaan believes a new setting might help her heal, and moves her into a recently vacated apartment. Between the strange behavior of the neighbors and the mysterious disappearance of the apartment's former tenant, Mehak begins to fear that her new home might be the most dangerous place of all. Is it all in her mind or is there a real danger haunting her?

programme.title: Badho Bahu Rerun
programme.desc: Badho Bahu tells the story of an overweight girl, Komal, who gets the nickname Badho because of her physical appearance.
